answer:
We do not have information on what vaccines are required for medical assessments for jobs in the medical field. You will need to contact the institution or company you are applying to for this information. 
I you are looking for information on immunizations recommended for health care workers in BC, you can contact your local public health unit for this information.  You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here. 
The Canadian Immunization Guide also has information on vaccines recommended for health care workers.
question: Hi I'm wondering what vaccines are required for most medical assessments for jobs in the medical field
question_variation_1: vaccinations required for most medical assessments for jobs in medical field
question_variation_2: vaccines required for med exams in medical field
